df-fm
blocks.content: Define a function that takes a filter to a neighborhood filter of the range. (Since we now allow filter bases to have support smaller than the base set, the function has to come first to ensure that curryings are sets.) (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 20-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-fm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cfm, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), cfg, crn(cmpt(s3, cv(s2), cima(cv(s1), cv(s3))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-fm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ FilMap =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(fBas ` dom(s1))‚Ü¶(s0[filGen]ran((s3 ‚àà s2 ‚Ü¶(s1 " s3))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
}

blocks.name: df-flim
blocks.content: Define a function (indexed by a topology ` j ` ) whose value is the limits of a filter ` f ` . (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 4-Sep-2009.)

blocks.name: df-flf
blocks.content: Define a function that gives the limits of a function ` f ` in the filter sense. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 14-Oct-2009.)

blocks.name: df-fcls
blocks.content: Define a function that takes a filter in a topology to its set of cluster points. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 10-Nov-2009.)

blocks.name: df-fcf
blocks.content: Define a function that gives the cluster points of a function. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 24-Nov-2009.)

blocks.name: fmval
blocks.content: Introduce a function that takes a function from a filtered domain to a set and produces a filter which consists of supersets of images of filter elements. The functions which are dealt with by this function are similar to nets in topology. For example, suppose we have a sequence filtered by the filter generated by its tails under the usual positive integer ordering. Then the elements of this filter are precisely the supersets of tails of this sequence. Under this definition, it is not too difficult to see that the limit of a function in the filter sense captures the notion of convergence of a sequence. As a result, the notion of a filter generalizes many ideas associated with sequences, and this function is one way to make that relationship precise in Metamath. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)

thm fmss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wcel(c4, cfv(cfbas, c3))), wa(wf(c5, c3, c0), wss(c2, c4))), wss(cfv(co(c0, cfm, c5), c2), cfv(co(c0, cfm, c5), c4)))

blocks.name: fmfg
blocks.content: The image filter of a filter base is the same as the image filter of its generated filter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fmfg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c0)), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cfm, c4), c2), cfv(co(c0, cfm, c4), c5)))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c3, cfg, c2))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cfv(co(c0, cfm, c4), c2), cfv(co(c0, cfm, c4), c5), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c0)))
  bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(co(c0, cfm, c4), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(co(c0, cfm, c4), c5)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(hs1, c5, wss(cima(c4, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))
  elfm2(hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cv(hs0), c5)
  syl3an2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(co(c0, cfm, c4), c5)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(hs1, c5, wss(cima(c4, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))), wcel(c5, cfv(cfbas, c3)))
  syl(wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wcel(c5, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wcel(c5, cfv(cfil, c3)))
  syl5eqel(c5, cfv(cfil, c3), co(c3, cfg, c2), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)))
  fgcl(c2, c3)
  filfbas(c5, c3)
  elfm(hs1, c0, c1, c5, c3, c4, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(co(c0, cfm, c4), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(co(c0, cfm, c4), c5))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs1.c(c4)

  diff.hs1.c(c5)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà(fBas ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c0))‚Üí((c0[FilMap]c4)` c2)=((c0[FilMap]c4)` c5))

  syl(c2 ‚àà(fBas ` c3), c5 ‚àà(fBas ` c3), c5 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))

blocks.name: rnelfm
blocks.content: A condition for a filter to be an image filter for a given function. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 14-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)

thm fmfnfmlem4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s1, cfv(cfi, cun(c2, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, cima(ccnv(c3), cv(s2)))))), wss(cima(c3, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, c4, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(cfv(co(c1, cfm, c3), c2), c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  impbid(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s1, cfv(cfi, cun(c2, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, cima(ccnv(c3), cv(s2)))))), wss(cima(c3, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))
  jcad(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s1, cfv(cfi, cun(c2, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, cima(ccnv(c3), cv(s2)))))), wss(cima(c3, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  syl(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))
  filelss(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cfi, cun(c2, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, cima(ccnv(c3), cv(s2)))))), wss(cima(c3, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))

blocks.name: fmfnfm
blocks.content: A filter finer than an image filter is an image filter of the same function. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 13-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: fmufil
blocks.content: An image filter of an ultrafilter is an ultrafilter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 11-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)

  anbi2d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cfv(cfbas, c5))), wa(wf(c6, c2, c0), wf(c7, c5, c2))), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(hs1, c4, wss(cima(ccom(c6, c7), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs2, cfv(co(c2, cfm, c7), c4), wss(cima(c6, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))

blocks.name: ufldom
blocks.content: The ultrafilter lemma property is a cardinal invariant, so since it transfers to subsets it also transfers over set dominance. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: flimval
blocks.content: The set of limit points of a filter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 4-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)

thm flimval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(cfil)))), wceq(co(c0, cflim, c1), crab(s0, c2, wa(wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1), wss(c1, cpw(c2))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(cfil))), wceq(co(c0, cflim, c1), crab(s0, c2, wa(wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1), wss(c1, cpw(c2))))), wcel(crab(s0, c2, wa(wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1), wss(c1, cpw(c2)))), universe))

  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(cfil))), wcel(c2, c0))
  topopn(c0, c2)
  rabexg(s0, c2, c0, wa(wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1), wss(c1, cpw(c2))))
  ovmpt2ga(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop, c1, cuni(crn(cfil)), crab(s0, c2, wa(wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1), wss(c1, cpw(c2)))), universe, cflim, crab(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), wa(wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cpw(cuni(cv(hs0)))))))
  rabeqbidv(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))))), wa(wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1), wss(c1, cpw(c2))))

  sseq12d(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  fveq1d(cfv(cnei, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0)), cfv(cnei, c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  fveq2d(cnei, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))

  mpd3an3(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil), (c0[fLim]c1)= { s0 ‚àà c2 |(((nei ` c0)` { s0 })‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ P(c2))}, { s0 ‚àà c2 |(((nei ` c0)` { s0 })‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ P(c2))} ‚àà ùïå)

  diff.hs1.c(‚ãÉ ran(Fil))
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 ‚àà c2 |(((nei ` c0)` { s0 })‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ P(c2))})

thm elflim2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  elmpt2cl(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cflim, c2, ctop, cuni(crn(cfil)), crab(hs2, cuni(cv(hs0)), wa(wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(hs2))), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cpw(cuni(cv(hs0)))))))

thm elflim2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[fLim]c2)‚Üî((c1 ‚àà Top ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ P(c3))‚àß(c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß((nei ` c1)` { c0 })‚äÜ c2)))
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ c1
} = {
  3bitr4ri(c0 ‚àà(c1[fLim]c2), ((c1 ‚àà Top ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ P(c3))‚àß(c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß((nei ` c1)` { c0 })‚äÜ c2)), (((c1 ‚àà Top ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil))‚àß c2 ‚äÜ P(c3))‚àß(c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß((nei ` c1)` { c0 })‚äÜ c2)), ((c1 ‚àà Top ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil))‚àß(c2 ‚äÜ P(c3)‚àß(c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß((nei ` c1)` { c0 })‚äÜ c2))))
  anass((c1 ‚àà Top ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil)), c2 ‚äÜ P(c3), (c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß((nei ` c1)` { c0 })‚äÜ c2))
  anbi1i((c1 ‚àà Top ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ P(c3)), (c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß((nei ` c1)` { c0 })‚äÜ c2), ((c1 ‚àà Top ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil))‚àß c2 ‚äÜ P(c3)))
  df-3an(c1 ‚àà Top, c2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil), c2 ‚äÜ P(c3))

  elmpt2cl(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cflim, c2, ctop, ‚ãÉ ran(Fil), { hs2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ hs0 |(((nei ` hs0)` { hs2 })‚äÜ hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚äÜ P(‚ãÉ hs0))})
  df-flim(hs0, hs1, hs2)

  eleq2d(c0, (c1[fLim]c2), { hs2 ‚àà c3 |(((nei ` c1)` { hs2 })‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ P(c3))}, (c1 ‚àà Top ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil)))
  flimval(hs2, c1, c2, c3)
  bitri(c0 ‚àà { hs2 ‚àà c3 |(((nei ` c1)` { hs2 })‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ P(c3))}, (c2 ‚äÜ P(c3)‚àß(c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß((nei ` c1)` { c0 })‚äÜ c2)), (c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß(c2 ‚äÜ P(c3)‚àß((nei ` c1)` { c0 })‚äÜ c2)))

  biancomd(hs2 = c0, (((nei ` c1)` { hs2 })‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ P(c3)), c2 ‚äÜ P(c3), ((nei ` c1)` { c0 })‚äÜ c2)
  anbi1d(hs2 = c0, ((nei ` c1)` { hs2 })‚äÜ c2, c2 ‚äÜ P(c3), ((nei ` c1)` { c0 })‚äÜ c2)

blocks.name: flimtop
blocks.content: Reverse closure for the limit point predicate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: flimneiss
blocks.content: A filter contains the neighborhood filter as a subfilter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: flimnei
blocks.content: A filter contains all of the neighborhoods of its limit points. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 4-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: flimelbas
blocks.content: A limit point of a filter belongs to its base set. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 4-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: flimfil
blocks.content: Reverse closure for the limit point predicate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)

thm flimfil(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c1))
} = {
  eleqtrd(c2, cfv(cfil, c3), cfv(cfil, cuni(c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c2))), wcel(c2, cuni(crn(cfil))))
  simp2d(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c2, cuni(crn(cfil))), wcel(c1, ctop), wss(c2, cpw(c3)))
  filunirn(c2)
  fveq2d(cfil, cuni(c2), c3, wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)))
  eqssd(cuni(c2), c3, wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wss(cuni(c2), c3), wss(c2, cpw(c3)))
  simp3d(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wss(c2, cpw(c3)), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, cuni(crn(cfil))))
  simplbi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, cuni(crn(cfil))), wss(c2, cpw(c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0)), c2)))
  elflim2(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  sspwuni(c2, c3)
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wss(c3, cuni(c2)), wcel(c3, c2))
  sseldd(c3, c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)))
  flimneiss(c0, c1, c2)
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0))), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c0, c3))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c1, ctop))
  flimtop(c0, c1, c2)
  topopn(c1, c3)
  flimelbas(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  opnneip(c1, c3, c0)

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[fLim]c2)‚Üí c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))

  syl(c0 ‚àà(c1[fLim]c2), c3 ‚àà c1, c1 ‚àà Top)

blocks.name: flimtopon
blocks.content: Reverse closure for the limit point predicate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm flimtopon(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))))
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1))), wcel(c1, ctop))
  flimtop(c0, c1, c2)
  baib(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1)))
  istopon(c1, c3)
  impbid(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c1))))
  eleq2d(c2, cfv(cfil, c3), cfv(cfil, cuni(c1)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1)))
  fveq2(c3, cuni(c1), cfil)
  syl5ibcom(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1)), wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c1))))
  flimfil(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  filunibas(c2, cuni(c1))
  eqeq1d(cuni(c2), cuni(c1), c3, wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)))
  filunibas(c2, c3)
}

thm flimtopon(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[fLim]c2)‚Üí(c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)‚Üî c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)))
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ‚àà(c1[fLim]c2), c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3), c3 = ‚ãÉ c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà(c1[fLim]c2), (c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)‚Üî c3 = ‚ãÉ c1), c1 ‚àà Top)
  flimtop(c0, c1, c2)
  baib(c1 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), c3 = ‚ãÉ c1)
  istopon(c1, c3)
  impbid(c0 ‚àà(c1[fLim]c2), c3 = ‚ãÉ c1, c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))
  syl5ibrcom(c0 ‚àà(c1[fLim]c2), c3 = ‚ãÉ c1, c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c1))
  eleq2d(c2, (Fil ` c3), (Fil ` ‚ãÉ c1), c3 = ‚ãÉ c1)
  fveq2(c3, ‚ãÉ c1, cfil)
  syl5ibcom(c0 ‚àà(c1[fLim]c2), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3), c3 = ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c2 = ‚ãÉ c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà(c1[fLim]c2), ‚ãÉ c2 = ‚ãÉ c1, c2 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c1))

blocks.name: elflim
blocks.content: The predicate "is a limit point of a filter." (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 4-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elflim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cflim, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), c2))))
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(c3, co(c0, cflim, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), c2)), wa(wcel(c3, cuni(c0)), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), c2)))

  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cflim, c3))), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))

  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cflim, c3))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cflim, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(hs0))), c2))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)))

blocks.name: neiflim
blocks.content: A point is a limit point of its neighborhood filter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 7-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm neiflim(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c0, cflim, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2)))))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c0, cflim, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2)))), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2)))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2)))))
  jctr(wcel(c2, c1), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2))))
  ssid(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cflim, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2)))), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2))))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2)), cfv(cfil, c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2)), cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(csn(c2), c1), wne(csn(c2), emptycls))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wss(csn(c2), c1))
  snssi(c2, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wne(csn(c2), emptycls))
  snnzg(c2, c1)
  neifil(c0, c1, csn(c2))
  elflim(c0, c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c2)), c2)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c2 ‚àà(c0[fLim]((nei ` c0)` { c2 })))

blocks.name: fbflim
blocks.content: A condition for a filter to converge to a point involving one of its bases. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 4-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)

thm fbflim(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1))), wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cflim, c4)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c1, cfg, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1))), wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cflim, c4)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))), diffsc(s1, c0))

  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1))), wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cflim, c4)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))), diffsc(s1, c3))

  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cflim, c4)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c4))))), wcel(c4, cfv(cfil, c1)))

  ralbidva(s0, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1))), wcel(c3, c1)), wi(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wi(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  imbi2d(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1))), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))

  elfg(s1, c2, c1, cv(s0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1))), wcel(c3, c1))

  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)

  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cfv(cfbas, c1))

blocks.name: fbflim2
blocks.content: A condition for a filter base ` B ` to converge to a point ` A ` . Use neighborhoods instead of open neighborhoods. Compare ~ fbflim . (Contributed by FL, 4-Jul-2011.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: flimclsi
blocks.content: The convergent points of a filter are a subset of the closure of any of the filter sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm flimclsi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(co(c2, cflim, c1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c0)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c2, cflim, c1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  ex(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c0)))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c0)), wral(hs1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c2), csn(cv(hs0))), wne(cin(cv(hs1), c0), emptycls)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c2), csn(cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c1))), wne(cin(cv(hs1), c0), emptycls))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c2), csn(cv(hs0))))), wne(cin(cv(hs1), c0), emptycls), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, cuni(c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(c0, c1))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c2), csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, cuni(c2))))
  adantll(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c2), csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  flimnei(cv(hs0), c2, c1, cv(hs1))
  simpll(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cnei, c2), csn(cv(hs0)))))
  filinn0(c1, cuni(c2), cv(hs1), c0)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c1))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c0)), wral(hs1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c2), csn(cv(hs0))), wne(cin(cv(hs1), c0), emptycls))), wcel(c2, ctop), wss(c0, cuni(c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c1)), wcel(c2, ctop))
  flimtop(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c1)), wss(c0, cuni(c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, cuni(c2))))
  flimfil(cv(hs0), c2, c1, cuni(c2))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, cuni(c2))), wss(c0, cuni(c2)))
  filelss(c1, cuni(c2), c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c2)))
  flimelbas(cv(hs0), c2, c1, cuni(c2))
  neindisj2(hs1, c2, c0, cuni(c2), cv(hs0))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, cflim, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c1))))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c2))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
}

thm flimclsi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2[fLim]c1)‚äÜ((cls ` c2)` c0))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, (c2[fLim]c1), ((cls ` c2)` c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  ex(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(c2[fLim]c1), hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c2)` c0))
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c2[fLim]c1)), hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c2)` c0), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà((nei ` c2)` { hs0 }),(hs1 ‚ãÇ c0)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  ralrimiva(hs1, ((nei ` c2)` { hs0 }), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c2[fLim]c1)), (hs1 ‚ãÇ c0)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c2[fLim]c1))‚àß hs1 ‚àà((nei ` c2)` { hs0 })), (hs1 ‚ãÇ c0)‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c2), hs1 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c1)
  ad2antlr(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(c2[fLim]c1), hs1 ‚àà((nei ` c2)` { hs0 }), c1 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c2))
  adantll(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(c2[fLim]c1), hs1 ‚àà((nei ` c2)` { hs0 }), hs1 ‚àà c1)
  flimnei(hs0, c2, c1, hs1)
  simpll(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(c2[fLim]c1), hs1 ‚àà((nei ` c2)` { hs0 }))
  filinn0(c1, ‚ãÉ c2, hs1, c0)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c2[fLim]c1)), (hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c2)` c0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà((nei ` c2)` { hs0 }),(hs1 ‚ãÇ c0)‚â† ‚àÖ)), c2 ‚àà Top, c0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c2, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c2)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(c2[fLim]c1), c2 ‚àà Top)
  flimtop(hs0, c2, c1)
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(c2[fLim]c1), c0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c2, c1 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c2))
  flimfil(hs0, c2, c1, ‚ãÉ c2)
  ancoms(c0 ‚àà c1, c1 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c2), c0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c2)
  filelss(c1, ‚ãÉ c2, c0)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(c2[fLim]c1), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c2)
  flimelbas(hs0, c2, c1, ‚ãÉ c2)
  neindisj2(hs1, c2, c0, ‚ãÉ c2, hs0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c2[fLim]c1))
  diff.hs0.c(((cls ` c2)` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà c1)
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c2[fLim]c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(‚ãÉ c2)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
}

blocks.name: hausflimlem
blocks.content: If ` A ` and ` B ` are both limits of the same filter, then all neighborhoods of ` A ` and ` B ` intersect. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hausflimlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cflim, c2))), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c5))), wne(cin(c4, c5), emptycls))
} = {
  syl3anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cflim, c2))), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c5))), wne(cin(c4, c5), emptycls), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c1))), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  syl(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cflim, c2))), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c5))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c1))), wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)))
  flimfil(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  syl2anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cflim, c2))), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c5))), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c4, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0))))
  syl3anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cflim, c2))), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c5))), wcel(c4, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0))), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c0, c4))
  simp2l(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cflim, c2))), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c5)))
  simp3l(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cflim, c2))), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1)), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c5))
  opnneip(c1, c4, c0)
  flimnei(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  syl2anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cflim, c2))), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c5))), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c3, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c5, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c3))))
  simp1r(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c5)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cflim, c2))), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c5))), wcel(c5, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c3))), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c3, c5))
  syl(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cflim, c2))), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c5))), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)))

blocks.name: hausflimi
blocks.content: One direction of ~ hausflim . A filter in a Hausdorff space has at most one limit. (Contributed by FL, 14-Nov-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: hausflim
blocks.content: A condition for a topology to be Hausdorff in terms of filters. A topology is Hausdorff iff every filter has at most one limit point. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: flimcf
blocks.content: Fineness is properly characterized by the property that every limit point of a filter in the finer topology is a limit point in the coarser topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {

  ralrimiva(s0, cfv(cfil, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wss(c0, c2)), wss(co(c2, cflim, cv(s0)), co(c0, cflim, cv(s0))))

  expr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cflim, cv(s0))))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), co(c0, cflim, cv(s0)), co(c2, cflim, cv(s0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wss(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, cv(s0))))))

blocks.name: flimsncls
blocks.content: If ` A ` is a limit point of the filter ` F ` , then all the points which specialize ` A ` (in the specialization preorder) are also limit points. Thus, the set of limit points is a union of closed sets (although this is only nontrivial for non-T1 spaces). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: hauspwpwf1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ hauspwpwdom . Points in the closure of a set in a Hausdorff space are characterized by the open neighborhoods they extend into the generating set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: hauspwpwdom
blocks.content: If ` X ` is a Hausdorff space, then the cardinality of the closure of a set ` A ` is bounded by the double powerset of ` A ` . In particular, a Hausdorff space with a dense subset ` A ` has cardinality at most ` ~P ~P A ` , and a separable Hausdorff space has cardinality at most ` ~P ~P NN ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: flffval
blocks.content: Given a topology and a filtered set, return the convergence function on the functions from the filtered set to the base set of the topological space. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 14-Oct-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)

thm flffval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cflf, c2), cmpt(s0, co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cflf, c2), cmpt(s0, co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(s0)), c2))), cmpt(s0, co(cuni(c0), cmap, cuni(c2)), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(cuni(c0), cfm, cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cflf, c2), cmpt(s0, co(cuni(c0), cmap, cuni(c2)), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(cuni(c0), cfm, cv(s0)), c2)))), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c2, cuni(crn(cfil))))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  sseli(c2, cfv(cfil, c3), cuni(crn(cfil)))
  fvssunirn(cfil, c3)
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop, c2, cuni(crn(cfil)), cflf, cmpt(s0, co(cuni(c0), cmap, cuni(c2)), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(cuni(c0), cfm, cv(s0)), c2))), cmpt(s0, co(cuni(cv(hs0)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), cflim, cfv(co(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfm, cv(s0)), cv(hs1)))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, co(cuni(cv(hs0)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), cflim, cfv(co(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfm, cv(s0)), cv(hs1))), co(cuni(c0), cmap, cuni(c2)), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(cuni(c0), cfm, cv(s0)), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  oveqan12d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c0), cuni(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  unieq(cv(hs1), c2)
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), cflim, cfv(co(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfm, cv(s0)), cv(hs1)), c0, cfv(co(cuni(c0), cfm, cv(s0)), c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fveq12d(co(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfm, cv(s0)), cv(hs1), co(cuni(c0), cfm, cv(s0)), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  oveq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfm, cv(s0), cuni(c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  df-flf(hs0, hs1, s0)
  mptex(s0, co(cuni(c0), cmap, cuni(c2)), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(cuni(c0), cfm, cv(s0)), c2)))
  ovex(cuni(c0), cmap, cuni(c2))
  mpteq12dv(s0, co(cuni(c0), cmap, cuni(c2)), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(cuni(c0), cfm, cv(s0)), c2)), co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(s0)), c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))))
  oveqan12d(cuni(c0), cmap, cuni(c2), c1, c3, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)))
  filunibas(c2, c3)
  oveq2d(c0, cflim, cfv(co(cuni(c0), cfm, cv(s0)), c2), cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(s0)), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))))
  fveq1d(co(cuni(c0), cfm, cv(s0)), c2, co(c1, cfm, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))))
  oveq1d(cuni(c0), cfm, cv(s0), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wceq(cuni(c0), c1))
  eqcomd(cuni(c0), c1, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(crn(cfil)))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, co(cuni(c0), cmap, cuni(c2)), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(cuni(c0), cfm, cv(s0)), c2))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(crn(cfil)))
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(s0, co(cuni(c0), cmap, cuni(c2)), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(cuni(c0), cfm, cv(s0)), c2))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cuni(c0), cmap, cuni(c2))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cfv(cfil, c3))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfil, c3)
  diff.cfil.s(s0)
}

thm flffval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))‚Üí(c0[fLimf]c2)=(s0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶]c3)‚Ü¶(c0[fLim]((c1[FilMap]s0)` c2))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[fLimf]c2), (s0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶]c3)‚Ü¶(c0[fLim]((c1[FilMap]s0)` c2))), (s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c2)‚Ü¶(c0[fLim]((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]s0)` c2))), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)))
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3), (c0[fLimf]c2)=(s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c2)‚Ü¶(c0[fLim]((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]s0)` c2))), c0 ‚àà Top, c2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  sseli(c2, (Fil ` c3), ‚ãÉ ran(Fil))
  fvssunirn(cfil, c3)
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop, c2, ‚ãÉ ran(Fil), cflf, (s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c2)‚Ü¶(c0[fLim]((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]s0)` c2))), (s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ hs0[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ hs1)‚Ü¶(hs0[fLim]((‚ãÉ hs0[FilMap]s0)` hs1))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, (‚ãÉ hs0[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ hs1), (hs0[fLim]((‚ãÉ hs0[FilMap]s0)` hs1)), (‚ãÉ c0[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c2), (c0[fLim]((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]s0)` c2)), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  oveqan12d(‚ãÉ hs0, cmap, ‚ãÉ hs1, ‚ãÉ c0, ‚ãÉ c2, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  unieq(hs1, c2)
  oveq12d(hs0, cflim, ((‚ãÉ hs0[FilMap]s0)` hs1), c0, ((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]s0)` c2), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  fveq12d((‚ãÉ hs0[FilMap]s0), hs1, (‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]s0), c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  oveq1d(‚ãÉ hs0, cfm, s0, ‚ãÉ c0, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, ‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  df-flf(hs0, hs1, s0)
  mptex(s0, (‚ãÉ c0[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c2), (c0[fLim]((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]s0)` c2)))
  ovex(‚ãÉ c0, cmap, ‚ãÉ c2)
  mpteq12dv(s0, (‚ãÉ c0[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c2), (c0[fLim]((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]s0)` c2)), (c1[‚Ü¶]c3), (c0[fLim]((c1[FilMap]s0)` c2)), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)))
  oveqan12d(‚ãÉ c0, cmap, ‚ãÉ c2, c1, c3, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))
  filunibas(c2, c3)
  oveq2d(c0, cflim, ((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]s0)` c2), ((c1[FilMap]s0)` c2), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)))
  fveq1d((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]s0), c2, (c1[FilMap]s0), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)))
  oveq1d(‚ãÉ c0, cfm, s0, c1, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3), ‚ãÉ c0 = c1)
  eqcomd(‚ãÉ c0, c1, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ ran(Fil))
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c2)‚Ü¶(c0[fLim]((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]s0)` c2))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(‚ãÉ ran(Fil))
  diff.hs1.c((s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c0[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c2)‚Ü¶(c0[fLim]((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]s0)` c2))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, ‚ãÉ c0, cmap, ‚ãÉ c2)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (TopOn ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, (Fil ` c3))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfil, c3)
  diff.cfil.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: flfval
blocks.content: Given a function from a filtered set to a topological space, define the set of limit points of the function. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 8-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm flfval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cflf, c2), c4), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2))))
} = {
  3impa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cflf, c2), c4), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2))))
  syldan(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wf(c4, c3, c1), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cflf, c2), c4), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2))), wcel(c4, co(c1, cmap, c3)))
  biimpar(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wf(c4, c3, c1), wcel(c4, co(c1, cmap, c3)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wb(wcel(c4, co(c1, cmap, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c3, c2))
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  filtop(c2, c3)
  elmapg(c1, c0, c3, c2, c4)
  sylan9eq(cfv(co(c0, cflf, c2), c4), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2))), c4), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wcel(c4, co(c1, cmap, c3)))
  fveq1d(co(c0, cflf, c2), c4, cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))))
  flffval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  fvmpt(hs0, c4, co(c1, cmap, c3), cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2))), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2)), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  oveq2d(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2), cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  fveq1d(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2, co(c1, cfm, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c4, c1, cfm)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2))))

thm flfneii(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {

blocks.name: flfelbas
blocks.content: A limit point of a function is in the topological space. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 10-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm flfelbas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

blocks.name: hausflf
blocks.content: If a function has its values in a Hausdorff space, then it has at most one limit value. (Contributed by FL, 14-Nov-2010.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hausflf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)), wf(c3, c2, c4)), wmo(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(co(c0, cflf, c1), c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)), wf(c3, c2, c4)), wmo(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(co(c0, cflf, c1), c3))), wmo(s0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c4, cfm, c3), c1)))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)), wf(c3, c2, c4), wmo(s0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c4, cfm, c3), c1)))))
  hausflimi(s0, c0, cfv(co(c4, cfm, c3), c1))
  mobidv(s0, w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)), wf(c3, c2, c4)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(co(c0, cflf, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c4, cfm, c3), c1))))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cfv(co(c0, cflf, c1), c3), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c4, cfm, c3), c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)), wf(c3, c2, c4)))
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)), wf(c3, c2, c4), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cflf, c1), c3), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c4, cfm, c3), c1))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c4)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c4)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  haustop(c0)
  toptopon(c0, c4)
  flfval(c0, c4, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, co(c4, cfm, c3), c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c4, cfm, c3)
  diff.cfm.s(s0)
  diff.w3a.s(s0, wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)), wf(c3, c2, c4))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cha)
  diff.cha.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cfv(cfil, c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfil, c2)
  diff.cfil.s(s0)
  diff.wf.s(s0, c3, c2, c4)
}

  biimpi(wne(cfv(co(c0, cflf, c1), c3), emptycls), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(co(c0, cflf, c1), c3))))
  n0(hs0, cfv(co(c0, cflf, c1), c3))

  sylbbr(wa(wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(co(c0, cflf, c1), c3))), wmo(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(co(c0, cflf, c1), c3)))), wbr(cfv(co(c0, cflf, c1), c3), cen, c1o), weu(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(co(c0, cflf, c1), c3))))
  euen1b(hs0, cfv(co(c0, cflf, c1), c3))

  expr(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(co(c1, ccnp, c4), c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cima(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  mpd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(co(c1, ccnp, c4), c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cv(hs0)))), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cima(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs1, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wss(cima(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))

blocks.content: A function is continuous iff it respects filter limits. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 6-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: cnflf2

thm cnflf2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wcel(c4, co(c0, ccn, c2)), wa(wf(c4, c1, c3), wral(s0, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(cima(c4, co(c0, cflim, cv(s0))), cfv(co(c2, cflf, cv(s0)), c4)))), wa(wf(c4, c1, c3), wral(s0, cfv(cfil, c1), wral(hs0, co(c0, cflim, cv(s0)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(co(c2, cflf, cv(s0)), c4))))))
  cnflf(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  pm5.32da(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wf(c4, c1, c3), wral(s0, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(cima(c4, co(c0, cflim, cv(s0))), cfv(co(c2, cflf, cv(s0)), c4))), wral(s0, cfv(cfil, c1), wral(hs0, co(c0, cflim, cv(s0)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(co(c2, cflf, cv(s0)), c4)))))
  ralbidv(s0, cfv(cfil, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wf(c4, c1, c3)), wss(cima(c4, co(c0, cflim, cv(s0))), cfv(co(c2, cflf, cv(s0)), c4)), wral(hs0, co(c0, cflim, cv(s0)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(co(c2, cflf, cv(s0)), c4))))

  ffun(c4, c1, c3)

  fdm(c4, c1, c3)
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wf(c4, c1, c3), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  funimass4(hs0, c4, co(c0, cflim, cv(s0)), cfv(co(c2, cflf, cv(s0)), c4))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

  ralbidv(s0, (Fil ` c1), ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))‚àß(c4 : c1 ‚Üí c3)), (c4 "(c0[fLim]s0))‚äÜ((c2[fLimf]s0)` c4), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c0[fLim]s0),(c4 ` hs0)‚àà((c2[fLimf]s0)` c4)))
  syl2an2((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)), (c4 : c1 ‚Üí c3), ((c4 "(c0[fLim]s0))‚äÜ((c2[fLimf]s0)` c4)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c0[fLim]s0),(c4 ` hs0)‚àà((c2[fLimf]s0)` c4))), Fun(c4), (c0[fLim]s0)‚äÜ dom(c4))

  ssriv(hs0, (c0[fLim]s0), ‚ãÉ c0)
  flimelbas(hs0, c0, s0, ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c0)
  eqtrd(dom(c4), ‚ãÉ c0, c1, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))‚àß(c4 : c1 ‚Üí c3)))

blocks.name: flfcnp2
blocks.content: The image of a convergent sequence under a continuous map is convergent to the image of the original point. Binary operation version. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: fclsval
blocks.content: The set of all cluster points of a filter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 10-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)

thm fclsval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2))), wceq(co(c0, cfcls, c1), cif(ciin(s0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0))), emptycls, wceq(c3, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cfcls, c1), cif(ciin(s0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0))), emptycls, wceq(c3, c2)), cif(ciin(s0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0))), emptycls, wceq(c3, cuni(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2))), wceq(co(c0, cfcls, c1), cif(ciin(s0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0))), emptycls, wceq(c3, cuni(c1)))), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(cfil))), wcel(cif(ciin(s0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0))), emptycls, wceq(c3, cuni(c1))), universe))
  simpl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)), wcel(c1, cuni(crn(cfil))))
  sseli(c1, cfv(cfil, c2), cuni(crn(cfil)))
  fvssunirn(cfil, c2)
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2))), wcel(cif(ciin(s0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0))), emptycls, wceq(c3, cuni(c1))), universe), wcel(ciin(s0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0))), universe), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2))), wcel(ciin(s0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0))), universe), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), universe)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)), wne(c1, emptycls))

thm fclsval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2))‚Üí(c0[fClus]c1)= if(c3 = c2, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` c0)` s0)), ‚àÖ))
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[fClus]c1), if(c3 = c2, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` c0)` s0)), ‚àÖ), if(c3 = ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` c0)` s0)), ‚àÖ), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2)))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2)), (c0[fClus]c1)= if(c3 = ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` c0)` s0)), ‚àÖ), c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil), if(c3 = ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` c0)` s0)), ‚àÖ)‚àà ùïå)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2), c1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil))
  sseli(c1, (Fil ` c2), ‚ãÉ ran(Fil))
  fvssunirn(cfil, c2)
  sylancl((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2)), if(c3 = ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` c0)` s0)), ‚àÖ)‚àà ùïå, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` c0)` s0))‚àà ùïå, ‚àÖ ‚àà ùïå)
  sylancl((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2)), ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` c0)` s0))‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` c0)` s0)‚àà ùïå))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2), c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  filn0(c1, c2)
  rgenw(s0, c1, ((cls ` c0)` s0)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex((cls ` c0), s0)
  iinexg(s0, c1, ((cls ` c0)` s0), universe)
  0ex()
  ifcl(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` c0)` s0)), universe, emptycls, c3 = ‚ãÉ c1)
  ovmpt2ga(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop, c1, ‚ãÉ ran(Fil), if(c3 = ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` c0)` s0)), ‚àÖ), universe, cfcls, if(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ hs1, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà hs1,((cls ` hs0)` s0)), ‚àÖ))
  ifbieq1d(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà hs1,((cls ` hs0)` s0)), emptycls, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` c0)` s0)), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1), ‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ hs1, c3 = ‚ãÉ c1)
  eqeqan12d(‚ãÉ hs0, ‚ãÉ hs1, c3, ‚ãÉ c1, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  syl6eqr(‚ãÉ hs0, c3, ‚ãÉ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  unieq(hs1, c1)
  eqtrd(‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà hs1,((cls ` hs0)` s0)), ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` c0)` s0)), ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` hs0)` s0)), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  adantl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1, ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà hs1,((cls ` hs0)` s0))= ‚ãÇ(s0 ‚àà c1,((cls ` hs0)` s0)))
  iineq1(s0, hs1, c1, ((cls ` hs0)` s0))
  iineq2dv(s0, c1, ((cls ` hs0)` s0), ((cls ` c0)` s0), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  fveq1d((cls ` hs0), s0, (cls ` c0), ((hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1)‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))

  adantl(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2), (c3 = ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üî c3 = c2))
  eqeq2d(c3, ‚ãÉ c1, c2, c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2))
  filunibas(c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)

  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm fclstopon(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))))
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1))), wcel(c1, ctop))
  fclstop(c0, c1, c2)
  baib(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1)))
  istopon(c1, c3)
  impbid(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c1))))
  eleq2d(c2, cfv(cfil, c3), cfv(cfil, cuni(c1)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1)))
  fveq2(c3, cuni(c1), cfil)
  syl5ibcom(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wceq(c3, cuni(c1)), wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c1))))
  fclsfil(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  filunibas(c2, cuni(c1))
  eqeq1d(cuni(c2), cuni(c1), c3, wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)))
  filunibas(c2, c3)
}

thm isfcls2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c0))))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c0))))
  eleq2d(c2, cfv(cfil, c1), cfv(cfil, cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  fveq2d(cfil, c1, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  baib(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c0)))), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)))))
  bitri(wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c0)))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0))))), w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c0))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0))))))
  isfcls(s0, c3, c0, c2, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  df-3an(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c0))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)))))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}

thm fclsopn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚Üí(c3 ‚àà(c0[fClus]c2)‚Üî(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚Üí(c3 ‚àà(c0[fClus]c2)‚Üî(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)))))), d(s0, c1))
  3bitrd((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), c3 ‚àà(c0[fClus]c2), (c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1)), (c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1))))
  isfcls2(s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  pm4.71rd((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1)), c3 ‚àà c1)
  syld((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1)), c3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1)))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), (‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1))‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1))), c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  filn0(c2, c1)
  ex(c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1)))
  r19.2z(s1, c2, c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1))
  rexlimdva(s1, c2, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1), c3 ‚àà c1)
  sseld(c3, ((cls ` c0)` s1), c1, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))
  sseqtr4d(((cls ` c0)` s1), c1, ‚ãÉ c0, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))
  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2), ((cls ` c0)` s1)‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚àà Top, s1 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0)
  ad2antrr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), s1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Top)
  clsss3(c0, s1, ‚ãÉ c0)
  pm5.32da((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), c3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))))
  syl6bb(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))))
  ralbidva(s1, c2, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)))
  syl3anc((((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß s1 ‚àà c2), (c3 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` s1)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))), c0 ‚àà Top, s1 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0, c3 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0)
  ad3antrrr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c3 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Top)
  topontop(c0, c1)
  adantlr((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), c3 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0)
  sseqtrd(s1, ‚ãÉ c0, c1, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))
  adantll(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), s1 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚äÜ c1)
  filelss(c2, c1, s1)
  ad2antrr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), s1 ‚àà c2, c1 = ‚ãÉ c0)
  eleqtrd(c3, ‚ãÉ c0, c1, (((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))
  simplr((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), c3 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c2)
  ad3antrrr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c3 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c2, c1 = ‚ãÉ c0)
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  elcls(s0, c0, s1, ‚ãÉ c0, c3)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c0)
  bitri(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))))
  ralcom(s1, s0, c2, c0, (c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  ralbii(s0, c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)), (c3 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)))
  r19.21v(s1, c2, c3 ‚àà s0, (s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  diff.wa.s(s1, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), c3 ‚àà c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, (TopOn ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, (Fil ` c1))

blocks.name: fclsopni
blocks.content: An open neighborhood of a cluster point of a filter intersects any element of that filter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)

thm fclsopni(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wne(cin(c3, c4), emptycls))
} = {
  3imp2(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c4, c2), wne(cin(c3, c4), emptycls))
  syl8(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c0, c3), wi(wcel(c4, c2), wne(cin(c3, c4), emptycls)), wral(hs0, c2, wne(cin(c3, cv(hs0)), emptycls)))
  simpl2im(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wi(wcel(c3, c1), wi(wcel(c0, c3), wral(hs0, c2, wne(cin(c3, cv(hs0)), emptycls)))), wcel(c0, cuni(c1)), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wral(hs0, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls)))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cuni(c1)), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wral(hs0, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls))))))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cuni(c1)), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wral(hs0, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls)))))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c1))))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c1))))
  fclstopon(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c1))
  fclsfil(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  fclsopn(hs1, hs0, c1, cuni(c1), c2, c0)
  rspccv(hs1, c1, c3, wi(wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wral(hs0, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls))), wi(wcel(c0, c3), wral(hs0, c2, wne(cin(c3, cv(hs0)), emptycls))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(c0, cv(hs1)), wral(hs0, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls)), wcel(c0, c3), wral(hs0, c2, wne(cin(c3, cv(hs0)), emptycls)))
  eleq2(cv(hs1), c3, c0)
  ralbidv(hs0, c2, wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls), wne(cin(c3, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  neeq1d(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls, cin(c3, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  ineq1(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0))
  rspccv(hs0, c2, c4, wne(cin(c3, cv(hs0)), emptycls), wne(cin(c3, c4), emptycls))
  neeq1d(cin(c3, cv(hs0)), emptycls, cin(c3, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  ineq2(cv(hs0), c4, c3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)

thm fclsneii(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  ntropn(c1, c3, cuni(c1))

  snssd(c0, cuni(c1), w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0))), wcel(c4, c2)))

  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(c0))), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)))
  fclstop(c0, c1, c2)

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(c1[fClus]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà((nei ` c1)` { c0 })‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3 ‚ãÇ c4)‚â† ‚àÖ)

  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(c1[fClus]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà((nei ` c1)` { c0 })‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), ((int ` c1)` c3)‚àà c1, c1 ‚àà Top, c3 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c1)

blocks.name: fclssscls
blocks.content: The set of cluster points is a subset of the closure of any filter element. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fclssscls(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(co(c2, cfcls, c1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c0)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c2, cfcls, c1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl5(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c0)), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(hs1)))))
  simp3bi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c1)), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(hs1)))), wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, cuni(c2))))
  isfcls(hs1, cv(hs0), c2, c1, cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  rspcv(hs1, c0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c0)))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(hs1)), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c0, cfv(ccl, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, cfcls, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fclssscls(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2[fClus]c1)‚äÜ((cls ` c2)` c0))
} = {

  eleq2d(hs0, ((cls ` c2)` hs1), ((cls ` c2)` c0), hs1 = c0)
  fveq2(hs1, c0, (cls ` c2))
  diff.hs0.c((c2[fClus]c1))
  diff.hs0.c(((cls ` c2)` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà c1)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(‚ãÉ c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c2)` c0))
}

blocks.content: Cluster points in terms of neighborhoods. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 11-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)

thm fclsnei(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))))
  jca2(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))
  syl5ibr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c3, cuni(c0)))
  fclselbas(c3, c0, c2, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  eleq2d(c3, c1, cuni(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), c2, wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))
  3expb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3))), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))
  fclsneii(c3, c0, c2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))))
  imdistanda(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(c3, c1), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))), wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))))
  ralrimdva(hs0, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(c3, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))), wi(wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))
  com23(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))), wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))
  expr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wi(wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))
  syl(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c3, cv(hs0)))), wi(wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c3, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3))), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c3, cv(hs0)))
  ad3antrrr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c3, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c3, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, ctop))

  simprr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c3, cv(hs0)))
  opnneip(c0, cv(hs0), c3)
  rspcv(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))
  ralbidv(s1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), emptycls))
  neeq1d(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls, cin(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  ineq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  fclsopn(hs0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cnei, c0)
  diff.cnei.s(s1)
  diff.csn.s(s1, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfcls, c2)
  diff.cfcls.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, co(c0, cfcls, c2))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cfcls, c2)
  diff.cfcls.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(c3, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cnei, c0)
  diff.cnei.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), emptycls))
  diff.wne.s(s0, cin(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), emptycls)
  diff.cin.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)

  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)

thm fclsnei(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚Üí(c3 ‚àà(c0[fClus]c2)‚Üî(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  impbid((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), c3 ‚àà(c0[fClus]c2), (c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))))
  jca2((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), c3 ‚àà(c0[fClus]c2), c3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)))
  syl5ibr((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), c3 ‚àà(c0[fClus]c2), c3 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0)
  fclselbas(c3, c0, c2, ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c0)
  eleq2d(c3, c1, ‚ãÉ c0, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)))

  toponuni(c0, c1)
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, ((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), c2, c3 ‚àà(c0[fClus]c2), (s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  3expb(c3 ‚àà(c0[fClus]c2), s0 ‚àà((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), s1 ‚àà c2, (s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  fclsneii(c3, c0, c2, s0, s1)
  sylibrd((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), (c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))), c3 ‚àà(c0[fClus]c2), (c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(c3 ‚àà hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(hs0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)))))
  imdistanda((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)), c3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(c3 ‚àà hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(hs0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))))
  ralrimdva(hs0, c0, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)), (c3 ‚àà hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(hs0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)))
  com23((((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)), c3 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(hs0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))

  syl((((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà hs0)), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(hs0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)), hs0 ‚àà((nei ` c0)` { c3 }))

  topontop(c0, c1)
  simprl(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), hs0 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà hs0)
  simprr(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), hs0 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà hs0)
  opnneip(c0, hs0, c3)
  rspcv(s0, hs0, ((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(hs0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  ralbidv(s1, c2, s0 = hs0, (s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ, (hs0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  neeq1d((s0 ‚ãÇ s1), emptycls, (hs0 ‚ãÇ s1), s0 = hs0)
  ineq1(s0, hs0, s1)
  fclsopn(hs0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)

  diff.cnei.s(s1)
  diff.csn.s(s1, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, (c0[fClus]c2))

  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((nei ` c0)` { c3 }), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, (nei ` c0), { c3 })

  diff.cnei.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, c2, (hs0 ‚ãÇ s1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  diff.wne.s(s0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ s1), emptycls)
  diff.cin.s(s0, hs0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)

blocks.name: supnfcls
blocks.content: The filter of supersets of ` X \ U ` does not cluster at any point of the open set ` U ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm supnfcls(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c2)), wn(wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c2)), wn(wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  mpi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c2)), wn(wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)))))), wceq(cin(c2, cdif(c1, c2)), emptycls))
  disjdif(c2, c1)
  necon2bd(cin(c2, cdif(c1, c2)), emptycls, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0))))))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0))))), wne(cin(c2, cdif(c1, c2)), emptycls))
  syl13anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)))))), wne(cin(c2, cdif(c1, c2)), emptycls), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0))))), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)))))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0))))))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0))))))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0))))))
  elrabd(s0, cdif(c1, c2), cpw(c1), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfcls, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)))))), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), wss(cdif(c1, c2), cdif(c1, c2)))

thm fclsss1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c3)), wss(co(c3, cfcls, c2), co(c0, cfcls, c2)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c3, cfcls, c2), co(c0, cfcls, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c3)))
  pm2.43d(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfcls, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfcls, c2)))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfcls, c2)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfcls, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfcls, c2))))
  3imtr4d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfcls, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfcls, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wral(hs1, c3, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wral(hs2, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wral(hs1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wral(hs2, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls))))))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfcls, c2))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wral(hs1, c3, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wral(hs2, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wral(hs1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wral(hs2, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls)))))), wss(c0, c3))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfcls, c2)))
  anim2d(wss(c0, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wral(hs1, c3, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wral(hs2, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls)))), wral(hs1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wral(hs2, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls)))))
  ssralv(hs1, c0, c3, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wral(hs2, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls))))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfcls, c2))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfcls, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wral(hs1, c3, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wral(hs2, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls)))))), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  mpbird(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfcls, c2))), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfcls, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1))))
  fclstopon(cv(hs0), c3, c2, c1)
  fclsopn(hs1, hs2, c3, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfcls, c2))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfcls, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wral(hs1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wral(hs2, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls)))))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)))

  syl(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c3)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[fClus]c2)), ((hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c3,(hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚ãÇ hs2)‚â† ‚àÖ))))‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚ãÇ hs2)‚â† ‚àÖ))))), c0 ‚äÜ c3)

  ssralv(hs1, c0, c3, (hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c2,(hs1 ‚ãÇ hs2)‚â† ‚àÖ)))

blocks.content: Characterization of fineness of topologies in terms of cluster points. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 12-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: flimfcls
blocks.content: A limit point is a cluster point. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 12-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm flimfcls(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(co(c0, cflim, c1), co(c0, cfcls, c1))
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, co(c0, cflim, c1), co(c0, cfcls, c1))
  syl3anbrc(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cflim, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfcls, c1)), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, cuni(c0))), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(hs1)))))
  flimtop(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  flimfil(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cuni(c0))
  ralrimiv(hs1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cflim, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(hs1))))
  com12(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cflim, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(hs1))))
  sseld(cv(hs0), co(c0, cflim, c1), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  flimclsi(cv(hs1), c1, c0)
  isfcls(hs1, cv(hs0), c0, c1, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cflim, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cfcls, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cflim, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c0))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0[fLim]c1)‚äÜ(c0[fClus]c1)

blocks.name: flimfnfcls
blocks.content: A filter converges to a point iff every finer filter clusters there. Along with ~ fclsfnflim , this theorem illustrates the duality between convergence and clustering. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 12-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: fclscmpi
blocks.content: Forward direction of ~ fclscmp . Every filter clusters in a compact space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fclscmpi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2))), wne(co(c0, cfcls, c1), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  eqnetrd(co(c0, cfcls, c1), emptycls, cint(crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2))))
  syl6eq(co(c0, cfcls, c1), cint(crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(hs0))))), ciin(hs0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2))))
  sylan(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cfcls, c1), ciin(hs0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  syl6eq(co(c0, cfcls, c1), ciin(hs0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(hs0))), cif(ciin(hs0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(hs0))), emptycls, wceq(c2, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2))))
  fclsval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c2)
  iftruei(ciin(hs0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(hs0))), emptycls, wceq(c2, c2))
  eqid(c2)

blocks.name: uffclsflim
blocks.content: The cluster points of an ultrafilter are its limit points. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 11-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uffclsflim(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c2, cfcls, c0), co(c2, cflim, c0)))
} = {
  eqssd(co(c2, cfcls, c0), co(c2, cflim, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c2, cfcls, c0), co(c2, cflim, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c0)))
  rexlimddv(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c0)), wa(wss(c0, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, cv(hs1)))))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0)), wrex(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wa(wss(c0, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, cv(hs1))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0)), wrex(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wa(wss(c0, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, cv(hs1)))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  fclsfnflim(hs1, c0, c1, cv(hs0), c2)
  eleqtrrd(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, c0), co(c2, cflim, cv(hs1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfil, c1)), wa(wss(c0, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, cv(hs1)))))))
  simprrr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfcls, c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cflim, cv(hs1))))

blocks.name: ufilcmp
blocks.content: A space is compact iff every ultrafilter converges. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 11-Dec-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

  simplr((c0 ‚àà UFL ‚àß c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c0)), hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` c0), (s0 ‚àà(UFil ` c0)‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ s0))
  simprr(((c0 ‚àà UFL ‚àß c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c0))‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` c0)), s0 ‚àà(UFil ` c0), hs0 ‚äÜ s0)
  fclsss2(c1, c0, hs0, s0)
  ex((c1[fClus]s0)‚äÜ(c1[fClus]hs0), (c1[fClus]s0)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c1[fClus]hs0)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ssn0((c1[fClus]s0), (c1[fClus]hs0))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà UFL, c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c0), (c1 ‚àà Comp ‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` c0),(c1[fClus]hs0)‚â† ‚àÖ)))
  fclscmp(hs0, c1, c0)
  ralbiia(s0, (UFil ` c0), (c1[fClus]s0)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c1[fLim]s0)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  neeq1d((c1[fClus]s0), emptycls, (c1[fLim]s0), s0 ‚àà(UFil ` c0))
  uffclsflim(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, ccmp)
  diff.ccmp.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cufil, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cufil, ‚ãÉ c1)
  diff.cufil.s(s0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà UFL ‚àß c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(UFil ` c0),(c1[fClus]s0)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  diff.wa.s(s0, (c0 ‚àà UFL ‚àß c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c0)), hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` c0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà UFL, c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cufl)
  diff.cufl.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, (TopOn ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c0)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (Fil ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfil, c0)

  diff.wne.s(s0, (c1[fClus]hs0), emptycls)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cfcls, hs0)
  diff.cfcls.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
