  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: fcfval
blocks.content: The set of cluster points of a function. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 24-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fcfval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4), co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2))))
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4, co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2)), co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2)), universe, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1), wceq(co(c0, cfcf, c2), cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2)))))
  ovmpt2d(hs1, hs2, c0, cfcf, c2, cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2))), ctop, cuni(crn(cfil)), cmpt(hs0, co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs2))), co(cv(hs1), cfcls, cfv(co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfm, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))), universe, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wceq(cfcf, cmpo(hs1, hs2, ctop, cuni(crn(cfil)), cmpt(hs0, co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs2))), co(cv(hs1), cfcls, cfv(co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfm, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))))))
  df-fcf(hs1, hs2, hs0)
  mpteq12dv(hs0, co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs2))), co(cv(hs1), cfcls, cfv(co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfm, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2))), co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2))))
  oveq12d(cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs2)), c1, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2))))
  eqtrd(cuni(cv(hs2)), c3, cuni(c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2))))
  ad2antll(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2), wceq(cuni(cv(hs2)), cuni(c2)))
  unieq(cv(hs2), c2)
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2)), wceq(cuni(c2), c3))
  filunibas(c2, c3)
  oveq12d(cv(hs1), cfcls, cfv(co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfm, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)), c0, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2))))
  fveq12d(co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfm, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2), co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2))))
  oveq1d(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfm, cv(hs0), c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2))))
  eqtr4d(cuni(cv(hs1)), c1, cuni(c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2))))
  unieqd(cv(hs1), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2))))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2)), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wcel(c2, cuni(crn(cfil))))
  sseli(c2, cfv(cfil, c3), cuni(crn(cfil)))
  fvssunirn(cfil, c3)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wcel(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2))), universe))
  mptex(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  ovex(c1, cmap, c3)
  oveq2d(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2), cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))
  fveq1d(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2, co(c1, cfm, c4), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))
  oveq2d(c1, cfm, cv(hs0), c4, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  biimp3ar(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1), wcel(c4, co(c1, cmap, c3)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wb(wcel(c4, co(c1, cmap, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c3, c2))
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  filtop(c2, c3)
  elmapg(c1, c0, c3, c2, c4)
  ovexd(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cmap, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(cmpt(hs0, co(c1, cmap, c3), co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))))
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c2))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fcfval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1))‚Üí((c0[fClusf]c2)` c4)=(c0[fClus]((c1[FilMap]c4)` c2)))
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, (c0[fClusf]c2), c4, (c0[fClus]((c1[FilMap]c4)` c2)), (c1[‚Ü¶]c3), (c0[fClus]((c1[FilMap]hs0)` c2)), universe, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1)))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3), (c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1), (c0[fClusf]c2)=(hs0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶]c3)‚Ü¶(c0[fClus]((c1[FilMap]hs0)` c2))))
  ovmpt2d(hs1, hs2, c0, cfcf, c2, (hs0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶]c3)‚Ü¶(c0[fClus]((c1[FilMap]hs0)` c2))), ctop, ‚ãÉ ran(Fil), (hs0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ hs1[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ hs2)‚Ü¶(hs1[fClus]((‚ãÉ hs1[FilMap]hs0)` hs2))), universe, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)), fClusf =(hs1 ‚àà Top, hs2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil)‚Ü¶(hs0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ hs1[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ hs2)‚Ü¶(hs1[fClus]((‚ãÉ hs1[FilMap]hs0)` hs2)))))
  df-fcf(hs1, hs2, hs0)
  mpteq12dv(hs0, (‚ãÉ hs1[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ hs2), (hs1[fClus]((‚ãÉ hs1[FilMap]hs0)` hs2)), (c1[‚Ü¶]c3), (c0[fClus]((c1[FilMap]hs0)` c2)), ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c2)))
  oveq12d(‚ãÉ hs1, cmap, ‚ãÉ hs2, c1, c3, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c2)))
  eqtrd(‚ãÉ hs2, c3, ‚ãÉ c2, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c2)))
  ad2antll((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)), hs1 = c0, hs2 = c2, ‚ãÉ hs2 = ‚ãÉ c2)
  unieq(hs2, c2)
  ad2antlr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3), (hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c2), ‚ãÉ c2 = c3)
  filunibas(c2, c3)
  oveq12d(hs1, cfcls, ((‚ãÉ hs1[FilMap]hs0)` hs2), c0, ((c1[FilMap]hs0)` c2), ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c2)))
  fveq12d((‚ãÉ hs1[FilMap]hs0), hs2, (c1[FilMap]hs0), c2, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c2)))
  oveq1d(‚ãÉ hs1, cfm, hs0, c1, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c2)))
  eqtr4d(‚ãÉ hs1, c1, ‚ãÉ c0, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c2)))
  unieqd(hs1, c0, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c2)))
  simprl((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)), hs1 = c0, hs2 = c2)
  ad2antrr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3), (hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c2), c1 = ‚ãÉ c0)
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  simprr((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)), hs1 = c0, hs2 = c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3), c0 ‚àà Top)
  topontop(c0, c1)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3), c2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(Fil))
  sseli(c2, (Fil ` c3), ‚ãÉ ran(Fil))
  fvssunirn(cfil, c3)
  a1i((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)), (hs0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶]c3)‚Ü¶(c0[fClus]((c1[FilMap]hs0)` c2)))‚àà ùïå)
  mptex(hs0, (c1[‚Ü¶]c3), (c0[fClus]((c1[FilMap]hs0)` c2)))
  ovex(c1, cmap, c3)
  oveq2d(c0, cfcls, ((c1[FilMap]hs0)` c2), ((c1[FilMap]c4)` c2), ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1))‚àß hs0 = c4))
  fveq1d((c1[FilMap]hs0), c2, (c1[FilMap]c4), ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1))‚àß hs0 = c4))
  oveq2d(c1, cfm, hs0, c4, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1))‚àß hs0 = c4))
  simpr((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1)), hs0 = c4)
  biimp3ar(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3), (c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1), c4 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶]c3))
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3), (c4 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶]c3)‚Üî(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1)), c1 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c2)
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  filtop(c2, c3)
  elmapg(c1, c0, c3, c2, c4)
  ovexd(c0, cfcls, ((c1[FilMap]c4)` c2), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[fClus]((c1[FilMap]c4)` c2)))
  diff.hs0.c((c1[‚Ü¶]c3))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((hs0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶]c3)‚Ü¶(c0[fClus]((c1[FilMap]hs0)` c2))))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c((hs0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶]c3)‚Ü¶(c0[fClus]((c1[FilMap]hs0)` c2))))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)))
  diff.hs2.w((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)))
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3))‚àß(hs1 = c0 ‚àß hs2 = c2)))
}

blocks.name: isfcf
blocks.content: The property of being a cluster point of a function. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 24-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isfcf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wb(wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4)), wa(wcel(c5, c1), wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(c5, cv(s0)), wral(s1, c2, wne(cin(cv(s0), cima(c4, cv(s1))), emptycls)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)

blocks.name: fcfnei
blocks.content: The property of being a cluster point of a function in terms of neighborhoods. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 26-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: fcfelbas
blocks.content: A cluster point of a function is in the base set of the topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 26-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fcfelbas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4))), wcel(c5, c1))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(c5, c1, cuni(c0), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4))))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4)), wcel(c5, cuni(c0)))
  syl6bi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4)), wcel(c5, cuni(c0)), wcel(c5, co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2))))
  eleq2d(c5, cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4), co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)))
  fcfval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  fclselbas(c5, c0, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2), cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4))), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1), wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
}

  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1))‚àß c5 ‚àà((c0[fClusf]c2)` c4))‚Üí c5 ‚àà c1)
} = {

  imp((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1)), c5 ‚àà((c0[fClusf]c2)` c4), c5 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0)
  syl6bi((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1)), c5 ‚àà((c0[fClusf]c2)` c4), c5 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0, c5 ‚àà(c0[fClus]((c1[FilMap]c4)` c2)))
  eleq2d(c5, ((c0[fClusf]c2)` c4), (c0[fClus]((c1[FilMap]c4)` c2)), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1)))
  fcfval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  fclselbas(c5, c0, ((c1[FilMap]c4)` c2), ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c0)
  syl(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1))‚àß c5 ‚àà((c0[fClusf]c2)` c4)), c1 = ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  simpl1(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3), (c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1), c5 ‚àà((c0[fClusf]c2)` c4))

blocks.name: fcfneii
blocks.content: A neighborhood of a cluster point of a function contains a function value from every tail. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 27-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fcfneii(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4)), wcel(c6, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5))), wcel(c7, c2))), wne(cin(c6, cima(c4, c7)), emptycls))
} = {
  3imp2(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4)), wcel(c6, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5))), wcel(c7, c2), wne(cin(c6, cima(c4, c7)), emptycls))
  syl6bi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wcel(c5, cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4)), wi(wcel(c6, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5))), wi(wcel(c7, c2), wne(cin(c6, cima(c4, c7)), emptycls))), wa(wcel(c5, c1), wral(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5)), wral(hs1, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs0), cima(c4, cv(hs1))), emptycls)))))
  fcfnei(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  adantl(wcel(c5, c1), wral(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5)), wral(hs1, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs0), cima(c4, cv(hs1))), emptycls))), wi(wcel(c6, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5))), wi(wcel(c7, c2), wne(cin(c6, cima(c4, c7)), emptycls))))
  com3r(wral(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5)), wral(hs1, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs0), cima(c4, cv(hs1))), emptycls))), wcel(c6, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5))), wcel(c7, c2), wne(cin(c6, cima(c4, c7)), emptycls))
  ex(wcel(c6, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5))), wcel(c7, c2), wi(wral(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5)), wral(hs1, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs0), cima(c4, cv(hs1))), emptycls))), wne(cin(c6, cima(c4, c7)), emptycls)))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c6, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5)), c7, c2, wne(cin(cv(hs0), cima(c4, cv(hs1))), emptycls), wne(cin(c6, cima(c4, c7)), emptycls), wne(cin(c6, cima(c4, cv(hs1))), emptycls))
  neeq1d(cin(cv(hs0), cima(c4, cv(hs1))), emptycls, cin(c6, cima(c4, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c6))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c6, cima(c4, cv(hs1)))
  neeq1d(cin(c6, cima(c4, cv(hs1))), emptycls, cin(c6, cima(c4, c7)), wceq(cv(hs1), c7))
  ineq2d(c6, cima(c4, cv(hs1)), cima(c4, c7), wceq(cv(hs1), c7))
  imaeq2(cv(hs1), c7, c4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5)))
  diff.hs1.c(c6)
  diff.hs1.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.w(wne(cin(c6, cima(c4, cv(hs1))), emptycls))
  diff.hs1.w(wne(cin(c6, cima(c4, c7)), emptycls))

blocks.pretty:
thm fcfneii(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1))‚àß(c5 ‚àà((c0[fClusf]c2)` c4)‚àß c6 ‚àà((nei ` c0)` { c5 })‚àß c7 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(c6 ‚ãÇ(c4 " c7))‚â† ‚àÖ)

  3imp2((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1)), c5 ‚àà((c0[fClusf]c2)` c4), c6 ‚àà((nei ` c0)` { c5 }), c7 ‚àà c2, (c6 ‚ãÇ(c4 " c7))‚â† ‚àÖ)

  neeq1d((hs0 ‚ãÇ(c4 " hs1)), emptycls, (c6 ‚ãÇ(c4 " hs1)), hs0 = c6)
  ineq1(hs0, c6, (c4 " hs1))
  neeq1d((c6 ‚ãÇ(c4 " hs1)), emptycls, (c6 ‚ãÇ(c4 " c7)), hs1 = c7)

blocks.name: flfssfcf
blocks.content: A limit point of a function is a cluster point of the function. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: uffcfflf
blocks.content: If the domain filter is an ultrafilter, the cluster points of the function are the limit points. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 12-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uffcfflf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cufil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4), cfv(co(c0, cflf, c2), c4)))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4), cfv(co(c0, cflf, c2), c4), co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2)), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cufil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cufil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2)), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2))), wcel(cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2), cfv(cufil, c1)))
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cufil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1), wcel(cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2), cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c1, c0))
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  fmufil(c1, c0, c2, c3, c4)
  uffclsflim(cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2), c1, c0)
  syl3an2(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cufil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cfcf, c2), c4), co(c0, cfcls, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)))
  fcfval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  syl3an2(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cufil, c3)), wf(c4, c3, c1), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cflf, c2), c4), co(c0, cflim, cfv(co(c1, cfm, c4), c2))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c3)))
  ufilfil(c2, c3)
  flfval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
}

thm uffcfflf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(UFil ` c3)‚àß(c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1))‚Üí((c0[fClusf]c2)` c4)=((c0[fLimf]c2)` c4))
} = {

blocks.name: cnpfcfi
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ cnpfcf . If a function is continuous at a point, it respects clustering there. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 20-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fClus]c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà((c2[CnP]c0)` c1))‚Üí(c4 ` c1)‚àà((c0[fClusf]c3)` c4))
} = {
  rexlimddv(hs0, (Fil ` ‚ãÉ c2), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fClus]c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà((c2[CnP]c0)` c1)), (c4 ` c1)‚àà((c0[fClusf]c3)` c4), (c3 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fLim]hs0)))
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fClus]c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà((c2[CnP]c0)` c1)), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c2),(c3 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fLim]hs0))), c1 ‚àà(c2[fClus]c3))

  fclsfnflim(hs0, c3, ‚ãÉ c2, c1, c2)
  sseldd((c4 ` c1), ((c0[fClusf]c3)` c4), ((c0[fLimf]hs0)` c4), ((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fClus]c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà((c2[CnP]c0)` c1))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fLim]hs0)))))
  sstrd(((c0[fLimf]hs0)` c4), ((c0[fClusf]c3)` c4), ((c0[fClusf]hs0)` c4), ((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fClus]c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà((c2[CnP]c0)` c1))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fLim]hs0)))))
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fClus]c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà((c2[CnP]c0)` c1))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fLim]hs0)))), ((c0[fLimf]hs0)` c4)‚äÜ((c0[fClusf]hs0)` c4), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ c0), hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c2), (c4 : ‚ãÉ c2 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0))
  flfssfcf(c0, ‚ãÉ c0, hs0, ‚ãÉ c2, c4)
  3sstr4d(((c0[fClusf]hs0)` c4), ((c0[fClusf]c3)` c4), (c0[fClus]((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]c4)` hs0)), (c0[fClus]((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]c4)` c3)), ((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fClus]c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà((c2[CnP]c0)` c1))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fLim]hs0)))))
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fClus]c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà((c2[CnP]c0)` c1))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fLim]hs0)))), (c0[fClus]((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]c4)` hs0))‚äÜ(c0[fClus]((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]c4)` c3)), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ c0), ((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]c4)` c3)‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c0), ((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]c4)` c3)‚äÜ((‚ãÉ c0[FilMap]c4)` hs0))

  syl(((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fClus]c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà((c2[CnP]c0)` c1))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Fil ` ‚ãÉ c2)‚àß(c3 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà(c2[fLim]hs0)))), ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àà c0, c0 ‚àà Top)

blocks.name: cnpfcf
blocks.content: A function ` F ` is continuous at point ` A ` iff ` F ` respects cluster points there. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 14-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: flfcntr
blocks.content: A continuous function's value is always in the trace of its filter limit. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Aug-2020.)

thm flfcntr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(co(c2, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c3), csn(c1)), crest, c4)), c0)))

} = {
  rspcdva(hs0, c1, co(co(c3, crest, c4), cflim, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c3), csn(c1)), crest, c4)), w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(co(c2, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c3), csn(c1)), crest, c4)), c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(co(c2, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c3), csn(c1)), crest, c4)), c0)))

blocks.name: alexsub
blocks.content: The Alexander Subbase Theorem: If ` B ` is a subbase for the topology ` J ` , and any cover taken from ` B ` has a finite subcover, then the generated topology is compact. This proof uses the ultrafilter lemma; see ~ alexsubALT for a proof using Zorn's lemma. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 24-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm alexsub(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cufl))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cuni(c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, c2))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s0))))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, ccmp), wral(hs0, cfv(cufil, c1), wne(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cfv(cufil, c1), w0, wne(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  neqned(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1))))
  pm2.01d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1))), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  expr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls), wn(wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls)))
  pm2.21i(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls))), wn(wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls)))
  alexsublem(s0, s1, c1, c2, c0, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls)), wcel(c1, cufl))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls)), wceq(c1, cuni(c2)))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls)), wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, c2))))
  adantlr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls)), wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s1)))))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, ccmp), wral(hs0, cfv(cufil, c1), wne(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls))), wcel(c1, cufl), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  eleqtrrd(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cfv(cfi, c2))), w0)
  syl6eqel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(cfv(cfi, c2))), cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, c2)), w0)
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, c2)), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cfv(cfi, c2)))), wcel(cfv(cfi, c2), ctb))
  fibas(c2)
  tgtopon(cfv(cfi, c2))
  fveq2d(ctopon, c1, cuni(cfv(cfi, c2)), w0)
  eqtrd(c1, cuni(cfv(cfi, c2)), cuni(c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(cfv(cfi, c2))), wcel(c2, universe))
  sylibr(w0, wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cuni(c2), universe))
  eqeltrrd(cuni(c2), universe, c1, w0)
  elexd(c1, cufl, w0)
  uniexb(c2)
  fiuni(c2, universe)
  ufilcmp(hs0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cufil, c1)
  diff.cufil.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cflim, cv(hs0))
  diff.cflim.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls)))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cfv(cufil, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cufil, c1)
  diff.cufil.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(c0, cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cflim, cv(hs0))
  diff.cflim.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

thm alexsub(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Comp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà UFL)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 = ‚ãÉ c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(topGen `(fi ` c2)))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c1 = ‚ãÉ s0))‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(s0)‚ãÇ Fin), c1 = ‚ãÉ s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ‚àà Comp, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1),(c0[fLim]hs0)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  ralrimiva(hs0, (UFil ` c1), w0, (c0[fLim]hs0)‚â† ‚àÖ)

  expr(w0, hs0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), (c0[fLim]hs0)= ‚àÖ, ¬¨(c0[fLim]hs0)= ‚àÖ)
  pm2.21i((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß(c0[fLim]hs0)= ‚àÖ)), ¬¨(c0[fLim]hs0)= ‚àÖ)
  alexsublem(s0, s1, c1, c2, c0, hs0, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß(c0[fLim]hs0)= ‚àÖ)))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß(c0[fLim]hs0)= ‚àÖ), c1 ‚àà UFL)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß(c0[fLim]hs0)= ‚àÖ), c1 = ‚ãÉ c2)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß(c0[fLim]hs0)= ‚àÖ), c0 =(topGen `(fi ` c2)))
  adantlr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß(c0[fLim]hs0)= ‚àÖ), (s0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c1 = ‚ãÉ s0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(s0)‚ãÇ Fin), c1 = ‚ãÉ s1))
  simprl(w0, hs0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), (c0[fLim]hs0)= ‚àÖ)
  simprr(w0, hs0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), (c0[fLim]hs0)= ‚àÖ)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ‚àà Comp ‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1),(c0[fLim]hs0)‚â† ‚àÖ)), c1 ‚àà UFL, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  eleqtrrd(c0, (TopOn ` c1), (TopOn ` ‚ãÉ(fi ` c2)), w0)
  syl6eqel(c0, (TopOn ` ‚ãÉ(fi ` c2)), (topGen `(fi ` c2)), w0)
  ax-mp((topGen `(fi ` c2))‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ(fi ` c2)), (fi ` c2)‚àà TopBases)
  fibas(c2)
  tgtopon((fi ` c2))
  fveq2d(ctopon, c1, ‚ãÉ(fi ` c2), w0)
  eqtrd(c1, ‚ãÉ(fi ` c2), ‚ãÉ c2, w0)
  syl(w0, ‚ãÉ c2 = ‚ãÉ(fi ` c2), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  sylibr(w0, c2 ‚àà ùïå, ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqeltrrd(‚ãÉ c2, universe, c1, w0)
  elexd(c1, cufl, w0)
  uniexb(c2)
  fiuni(c2, universe)
  ufilcmp(hs0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, (hs0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß(c0[fLim]hs0)= ‚àÖ))

blocks.content: Biconditional form of the Alexander Subbase Theorem ~ alexsub . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)

thm alexsubb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wceq(c0, cuni(c1))), wb(wcel(cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, c1)), ccmp), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1))))))))

blocks.name: alexsubALTlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ alexsubALT . A compact space has a subbase such that every cover taken from it has a finite subcover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 27-Jan-2010.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)

} = {

  selpw(s1, c0)

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), wrex(s2, cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s2)))))), wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, c0))), wral(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), wrex(s2, cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s2)))))))

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Comp ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0,(c0 =(topGen `(fi ` s0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(s0),(c1 = ‚ãÉ s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà(P(s1)‚ãÇ Fin), c1 = ‚ãÉ s2))))))

} = {

  anbi12d(s0 = c0, c0 =(topGen `(fi ` s0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(s0),(c1 = ‚ãÉ s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà(P(s1)‚ãÇ Fin), c1 = ‚ãÉ s2))), c0 =(topGen `(fi ` c0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà P(c0),(c1 = ‚ãÉ s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà(P(s1)‚ãÇ Fin), c1 = ‚ãÉ s2))))

blocks.name: alexsubALTlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ alexsubALT . Every subset of a base which has no finite subcover is a subset of a maximal such collection. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 27-Jan-2010.)

blocks.name: alexsubALTlem3
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ alexsubALT . If a point is covered by a collection taken from the base with no finite subcover, a set from the subbase can be added that covers the point so that the resulting collection has no finite subcover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: alexsubALTlem4
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ alexsubALT . If any cover taken from a subbase has a finite subcover, any cover taken from the corresponding base has a finite subcover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm alexsubALTlem4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cv(s0)))), wi(wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), wrex(s2, cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s2)))))), wral(s3, cpw(cfv(cfi, cv(s0))), wi(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s3))), wrex(s4, cin(cpw(cv(s3)), cfn), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s4))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c1)
} = {
  ralrimdv(s3, cpw(cfv(cfi, cv(s0))), wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), wrex(s2, cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s2)))))), wi(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s3))), wrex(s4, cin(cpw(cv(s3)), cfn), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s4))))))

  syl5bir(w3a(wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), wrex(s2, cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s2)))))), wcel(cv(s3), cpw(cfv(cfi, cv(s0))))), wn(wrex(s4, cin(cpw(cv(s3)), cfn), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s4))))), wn(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s3)))), wral(s4, cin(cpw(cv(s3)), cfn), wn(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s4))))))
  ralnex(s4, cin(cpw(cv(s3)), cfn), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s4))))
  ex(w3a(wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), wrex(s2, cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s2)))))), wcel(cv(s3), cpw(cfv(cfi, cv(s0))))), wral(s4, cin(cpw(cv(s3)), cfn), wn(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s4))))), wn(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s3)))))
  mpd(wa(w3a(wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), wrex(s2, cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s2)))))), wcel(cv(s3), cpw(cfv(cfi, cv(s0))))), wral(s4, cin(cpw(cv(s3)), cfn), wn(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s4)))))), wn(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s3)))), wrex(hs0, cun(crab(hs2, cpw(cfv(cfi, cv(s0))), wa(wss(cv(s3), cv(hs2)), wral(s4, cin(cpw(cv(hs2)), cfn), wn(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s4))))))), csn(emptycls)), wral(hs1, cun(crab(hs2, cpw(cfv(cfi, cv(s0))), wa(wss(cv(s3), cv(hs2)), wral(s4, cin(cpw(cv(hs2)), cfn), wn(wceq(c1, cuni(cv(s4))))))), csn(emptycls)), wn(wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))

blocks.name: alexsubALT
blocks.content: The Alexander Subbase Theorem: a space is compact iff it has a subbase such that any cover taken from the subbase has a finite subcover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 24-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ptcmpg
blocks.content: Tychonoff's theorem: The product of compact spaces is compact. The choice principles needed are encoded in the last hypothesis: the base set of the product must be well-orderable and satisfy the ultrafilter lemma. Both these assumptions are satisfied if ` ~P ~P X ` is well-orderable, so if we assume the Axiom of Choice we can eliminate them (see ~ ptcmp ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: ptcmp
blocks.content: Tychonoff's theorem: The product of compact spaces is compact. The proof uses the Axiom of Choice. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ptcmp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, ccmp)), wcel(cfv(cpt, c2), ccmp))
} = {
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, ccmp), wcel(cfv(cpt, c2), ccmp), wcel(cuni(cfv(cpt, c2)), cin(cufl, cdm(ccrd))))
  elini(cuni(cfv(cpt, c2)), cufl, cdm(ccrd))
  eleqtrri(cuni(cfv(cpt, c2)), cufl, universe)
  ax-mp(wceq(cufl, universe), wac)
  axac3()
  acufl()
  eleqtrri(cuni(cfv(cpt, c2)), cdm(ccrd), universe)
  uniex(cfv(cpt, c2))
  fvex(cpt, c2)
  cardeqv()
  ptcmpg(c0, c1, c2, cuni(cfv(cpt, c2)), cfv(cpt, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cpt, c2))
  eqid(cuni(cfv(cpt, c2)))
}
